title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 309.6 - Date upon which disability retirement will commence
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 309.6 - Date upon which disability retirement will commence

State Regulations

In the event a member files an application for disability
retirement, and is granted such benefit, the effective date of such retirement
shall be established as being on the date of filing of such disability
retirement application or on the day after the last date on which the member
receives salary, whichever is later. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
309.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
